title: Teku needs more heap on non-finalizing chain
body:

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)

Sync Teku on Holesky with -Xmx6g and validators attached

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: v23.9.0
This may still have been an Xmx thing. Hang loose pls. I may close this once I know how to stabilize it

It's in much better shape with -Xmx7g, and may be stable with that amount. If not I  can bump to -Xmx8g.

That's a pretty large increase from -Xmx4g in steady state. Do you want this issue open to see where the heap goes, or is this normal and expected behavior during extended non-finality?
